author: echapon
body:
This PR is meant for the 2017 5TeV pp reference run and it includes the modifications needed in Offline DQM for the muon HLT triggers. This is to update the list of trigger paths in HLTMuonOfflineAnalyzer so that it includes the new muon triggers for the reference run.

This is a 92X backport of #21109, since this is the release family to be used online.
title: Offline DQM for 2017 5TeV pp Muon HLT (92X)
